font_line_height=”1.1″ font_size=”2.5vw” animation_delay=”-200″][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]Slush 2023 will host 100+ LPs representing university endowments, fund of funds, pension funds, sovereign wealth funds, and family offices from around the world.

We’ll arrange exclusive LP-only Side Events to connect you with other LPs, help you exchange notes on managers, and provide you with a relaxed setting to discuss the ecosystem.

The LP events will be invitation only gatherings for Slush’s LP ticket holders.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”10px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/tab][tab Slush 2023 brings RAISE to Europe

[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]Twenty high caliber European emerging managers (max raising fund no III) will be selected to attend after an application process. The GPs will be curated by a selection committee composed of LGT, Axa, Top Tier, Foobar, Isomer Capital, and Blue Future Partners.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]WHEN: Slush Day 2 (Dec 1st)
FOR WHOM: Slush LP ticket holders, 20 selected European emerging GPs.
FORMAT: GPs will present very short pitches, followed by networking. Food and drinks will be served.
WHERE: Slush main venue[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”white” divider_opacity=”50″ custom_height=”40PX”][nectar_text_inline_images media_type=”images” images=”2001,2000,2002,6484″ image_size=”medium” image_effect=”none” image_loading=”default”]

Slush x RAISE is kindly sponsored by
